policy-intro: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy describes how we collect and protect your data.
policy-data-intro: When you use our website, we may collect the following data:
policy-usage-title: How do we use your data?
policy-usage: The data you provide through the contact form is used solely to respond to your inquiries.
policy-cookies: We use cookies solely to save your language preference on the website. This data is not shared with third parties and is not used for tracking.
policy-security-title: How do we protect your data?
policy-security: We apply modern security measures to protect your data from loss and unauthorized access.
policy-rights: You have the right to request access, correction, or deletion of your data by sending us a request.
policy-changes: We may periodically update this policy. Any changes will be posted on this page.
